article_title: Judge Cancels ‘Redskins’ Trademark for Being Offensive.

og.description: Last week, a federal district court in Alexandria, Va., upheld the U.S. Patent and Trademark Trial and Appeal Board’s cancellation of six trademark registrations held... Read More
